changelog.description: Database backup system, improved deployment automation, version management enhancements
changes: Feature: Automated database backup system with retention policy (last 3 backups)
Feature: backup_database.sh - creates versioned SQL dumps separate from archives
Feature: verify_database_backup.sh - validates and displays backup information
Enhancement: Archive script excludes SQL dumps and Flutter build artifacts
Enhancement: Deployment script flexible for both Gunicorn and runserver environments
Documentation: Comprehensive VERSIONING_RULES.md with best practices
Documentation: Database backup and restore procedures
Fix: Archive size anomalies resolved (v527: 87MB â†’ v528-v530: 30-40MB)
Fix: Flutter build directory exclusion prevents 1.5GB bloat
Chore: Integrated backup creation into version management workflow
